QTRange Class Reference

This is a helper class used to specify a range in the quadtree. More...

#include <quad_tree.hpp>

 This method returns whether or not this range is in the quadtree with the input depth.

 This method clips this range so that it is entirely in the range of a quadtree with the input depth.

Detailed Description

This is a helper class used to specify a range in the quadtree.

Member Function Documentation

void QTRange::clip ( int  depth  )  [inline]

This method clips this range so that it is entirely in the range of a quadtree with the input depth.

bool QTRange::fills ( int  depth  )  const [inline]

This method returns whether or not this range fills a node at the input depth.

bool QTRange::inQuad ( int  depth  )  const [inline]

This method returns whether or not this range is in the quadtree with the input depth.

bool QTRange::isValid ( int  depth  )  const [inline]

This method returns whether or not this range is valid.

It is only used for debugging.
